---

- CD: current density checks

- P2P: point to point resistance checks

- LDL: logic driven layout checks, latch up related

- TOPO: topology, circuit connection and device size checks

> database
>
> - CD, P2P, LDL : dfmdb
>
> - TOPO: svdb


## references

Frank Feng. New Approach For Full Chip Electrical Reliability Verification [[pdf](https://cse.nsysu.edu.tw/app/index.php?Action=downloadfile&file=WVhSMFlXTm9MelV3TDNCMFlWOHhOamN6TnpWZk5qYzFNVGd6TjE4NE5ESXlOQzV3WkdZPQ==&)]
